content.question: Which of the following is the most likely reason why Adams dates the beginning of the American Revolution to the 1760s?

choices.label: Renewed efforts by Great Britain to consolidate imperial control over the colonies
The forging of American Indian political alliances with European powers
Increased involvement of colonial merchants in the Atlantic economy
The expansion of the colonial population into the interior of the continent

content.answer: Renewed efforts by Great Britain to consolidate imperial control over the colonies
